Container.Name: Unraid-PWA
Container.Overview: Open-source, self-hostable PWA to monitor and control Unraid via its GraphQL API. Default URL: http://[IP]:[PORT:2442]

Config.Name: WebUI Port
Config.Description: Host port for the Unraid-PWA web interface.

Config.Name: UNRAID_BFF_ALLOW_SELF_SIGNED
Config.Description: Allow self-signed certs for Unraid server connections (true/false).

Config.Name: UNRAID_BFF_TRUST_PROXY
Config.Description: Set true if you run behind a reverse proxy (or specific proxy mode if supported).

Config.Name: UNRAID_BFF_ORIGIN
Config.Description: CORS allowlist. Usually leave default when accessing via http://<UNRAID-IP>:2442.

Config.Name: UNRAID_BFF_ENCRYPTION_KEY
Config.Description: Optional override. If empty, the app generates /app/data/encryption.key.
